author: violatingcp
body:
These are changes to the puppi code in 80X. This includes : 
1. Addition of PuppiPhoton (with all fixes from 80X)
2. Addition of Puppi Jet corrector flags
3. Code to build puppi MET collections for MiniAOD Puppi MET

This does not include : 
1. 80X tune of puppi (with loosened forward particle cuts)
2. Updaed MiniAOD MET reconstruction code for Puppi

The 2 updates below will come with a bigger pull request that also includes the addition of the MET Uncertainties code.
title: Backport of puppi changes from 80X to 76X
